title: Tomato veg soup (Vegan)
ingredients: ['1 carrot – thinly sliced', '1 small potato – thinly sliced', '4 fresh tomatoes – chopped', '1 pepper – chopped', '75g fine green beans – cut in halves', '75g sugar snap peas – cut in halves', '1 400g tin chopped tomatoes', '1 40 tin red kidney beans', '1 teaspoon Marmite', '1 desert spoon vegan stock powder', 'salt & pepper']
